concept.title: Label
concept.shortdesc: The Label function displays the node name.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

conbody.p: When the cursor hovers over a node, the node name will automatically appear. To view the name of a node or multiple nodes at all times, execute the Verb Label in the Commands Tab.
